page.title: 19Entertainment in Gloucester
page.content: Entertainment in Gloucester is very varied.You can go into local pubs and listen to live music.{The"Dick {Whittington"}is the best pub for entertainment they have jazz on Monday and live music on Tuesday and Sunday. One of the best local groups that play there is Edge.People in their spare time play in the bands and sometimes improve so much they turn professional They perform at discos, parties, wedding discos. The main place for entertainment is the{Leisure}Centre.Amateur groups like St.Barnabas,Phoenix and the G.O.D.S. do plays there.Other entertainments are professoinal like orchestral concerts,and individual artists, Barbara Dickson,Lenny Henry,Freddie Starr.Famous pop musicians like Paul Young,Alvin Stardust and The Flying Pickets also perform there.
